SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT A.IN_DT, C.COMP_NAME, A.INVOICE_NO, TOTAL_PRICE, ITEM_CNT FROM TB_RCV_INFO A, ( SELECT RCV_NO, COUNT(*) ITEM_CNT , SUM(IN_QTY * IN_PRICE) TOTAL_PRICE FROM TB_RCV_ITEM GROUP BY RCV_NO) B, TB_PARTNER_INFO C WHERE A.RCV_NO = B.RCV_NO AND A.COMP_CD = C.COMP_CD
AND A.INVOICE_NO LIKE '%' || #{invoiceNo} || '%'
AND C.COMP_NAME LIKE '%' || #{compName} || '%'
AND TO_CHAR(IN_DT,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= #{inDtFrom}
AND TO_CHAR(IN_DT,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= #{inDtTo} )

SELECT A.INVOICE_NO, A.RCV_NO, C.ITEM_CD, B.ITEM_NAME, B.BOX_TYPE, B.BOX_QTY, C.IN_QTY, C.IN_PRICE, C.LOCATION FROM TB_RCV_INFO A ,TB_ITEM_INFO B , TB_RCV_ITEM C WHERE A.INVOICE_NO = #{invoiceNo} AND C.RCV_NO = A.RCV_NO AND B.ITEM_CD = C.ITEM_CD
